data.name: Sample - Claroty - 1.1.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Claroty" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Assets
workflows.description: Get assets from claroty server based on input parameters you have provided.

workflows.name: Get Alerts
workflows.description: Get Alerts from claroty server based on input parameters you have provided.

workflows.name: Get Alert Details
workflows.description: Get alert details based on alert resource id you have provided

workflows.name: Get Events
workflows.description: Get events from claroty server based on input parameters you have provided.

workflows.name: Get Insights
workflows.description: Get summary of an insights based on input parameters you have provided.

workflows.name: >> Claroty > Fetch Associated Events for Alerts
Get Tasks
workflows.description: Get all tasks and their information

workflows.name: Claroty > Ingest
workflows.description: Fetch Alerts from the Claroty and Creates records in FortiSOAR.

resource.name: {{vars.item["id"]}} : {{vars.item["type__"]}}

routes.name: Create Record -> Update Last Detection Fetch Macro
Update Last Detection Fetch Macro -> Get Related Events

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title": "Pull Alerts From Last X Minutes",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "text",
    "name": "minutes",
    "tooltip": "Fetch alerts from last X minutes. e.g 5",
    "value": 5
  },
  {
    "title": "Status",
    "name": "resolution__exact",
    "type": "multiselect",
    "options": [
      "Resolved",
      "Unresolved"
    ],
    "value": "Resolved",
    "visible": true,
    "editable": true,
    "required": false,
    "tooltip": "Maximum number of alerts to return in response",
    "description": "Maximum number of alerts to return in response"
  },
  {
    "title": "Category",
    "name": "category__exact",
    "type": "multiselect",
    "options": [
      "Security",
      "Integrity"
    ],
    "visible": true,
    "editable": true,
    "required": false,
    "tooltip": "Maximum number of alerts to return in response",
    "description": "Maximum number of alerts to return in response"
  },
  {
    "title": "Alert Severity",
    "name": "severity__exact",
    "type": "multiselect",
    "options": [
      "Critical",
      "High",
      "Medium",
      "Low"
    ],
    "visible": true,
    "editable": true,
    "required": false,
    "tooltip": "Select asset Criticality to filter assets based on it.",
    "description": "Select asset Criticality to filter assets based on it."
  },
  {
    "title": "Other Filters",
    "name": "filters",
    "type": "json",
    "visible": true,
    "editable": true,
    "required": false,
    "tooltip": "Enter JSON key values to filter the alerts response based on parameters provided. e.g{\"asset_id__exact\": \"122\", \"severity__exact\": 4}",
    "description": "Enter JSON key values to filter the alerts response based on parameters provided. e.g{\"asset_id__exact\": \"122\", \"severity__exact\": 4}. list of fields that can be used as key in filters parameters -  page, per_page, asset_id__exact, asset__exact, for_asset__exact, q__exact, primary_asset__exact, non_primary_assets__exact, virtual_zone__exact, alert_id__exact, ot_alerts__exact, family__exact, story_severity__exact, id__exact, site_id__exact, data__exact, description__exact, type__exact, category__exact, severity__exact, timestamp__exact, relevant__exact, resolved__exact, resolution__exact, protocol__exact, score__exact, is_qualified__exact, network_id__exact, resolved_id__exact, assigned_id__exact, story_id__exact, sort"
  },
  {
    "title": "Limit",
    "name": "per_page",
    "type": "integer",
    "visible": true,
    "editable": true,
    "required": false,
    "tooltip": "Maximum number of alerts to return in response",
    "description": "Maximum number of alerts to return in response"
  },
  {
    "title": "Event Count to Pull Per Alert",
    "name": "max_event_count",
    "type": "integer",
    "visible": true,
    "editable": true,
    "required": false,
    "tooltip": "Maximum number of events to pull per alert",
    "description": "Maximum number of events to pull per alert"
  }
]

routes.name: Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration

workflows.name: Get Queries
workflows.description: Get all queries and their information based on input parameters you have provided.

workflows.name: Get Asset Details
workflows.description: Get Details of an asset based on resource ID of an asset you have provided.

workflows.name: Get Insights Details
workflows.description: Get summary of an insights based on insight name you have provided.

workflows.name: Get Asset Risks And Vulnerabilities
workflows.description: Get Risks and Vulnerabilities of an asset based on resource ID of an asset you have provided.
